contents.title: Small in size
contents.description: CA Live API Creator enables microservices that are small when measured logically, physically or even in effort required. Developers are granted complete autonomy over logical service granularity, can deploy instances to anything from a Raspberry Pi to a massively scaled cluster and can accomplish an unprecedented amount of work with significantly less time and effort

contents.title: Messaging enabled
contents.description: Every microservice comes with a robust set of CRUD APIs for interacting with resources, as well as the ability to add functional APIs for more workflow-oriented use cases. The APIs are consistent and full-featured, providing pagination, sorting, searching, filtering, hypermedia links to related resources, multiple message formats and many parameters for customization.

contents.title: Continuously generate
contents.subtitle: Discover Pre-built templates. Use domain model to expose REST API endpoint, with out having to write any code.
contents.description: Drastically reduces time from concept to implementation

contents.subtitle: Better code without breaking the bank

contents.description: Trust that code is clean and light-weight. See how code comes together and packaged. Learn industry standards & better practices

contents.title: Operational Governance
contents.description: Your teams won't need to reimplement the tools for each stack, making it easier to focus on building robust standardized tools.
